mapper.sql: activitityId, activitityName, activitityStartTime, activitityEndTime, orgId, activititysCount, activitityType, activitityDescribe, activitityPlace, activitityStatus
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from activities
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into activities (activitityId, activitityName, activitityStartTime, activitityEndTime, orgId, activititysCount, activitityType, activitityDescribe, activitityPlace, activitityStatus) values (#{activitityid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activitityname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activititystarttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{activitityendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orgid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activitityscount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activititytype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activititydescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activitityplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activititystatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into activities
activitityId,
activitityName,
activitityStartTime,
activitityEndTime,
orgId,
activititysCount,
activitityType,
activitityDescribe,
activitityPlace,

mapper.update:
update activities
activitityId = #{record.activitityid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
activitityName = #{record.activitityname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where activitityId = #{activitityid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
